name: Pan-Cooked Brussels Sprouts With Green Garlic
description: These can be served as part of a rice bowl with brown rice, but they also make a nice side dish with just about anything.
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, healthy, high fiber, low cholesterol, low-sodium, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, side dish, spring
recipeIngredient: 1 pound brussels sprouts, trimmed and quartered
1/2 pound green garlic, trimmed, papery layers removed, and chopped
1 to 2 tablespoons chopped fresh dill or parsley

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the olive oil in a large, heavy skillet over medium-high heat and add the brussels sprouts. Cook, stirring often, until they begin to color, about 5 minutes. Turn down the heat to medium and add the garlic. Continue to cook, stirring, until the brussels sprouts are tender and the garlic is fragrant, another 3 to 5 minutes. Stir in the dill or parsley, taste and adjust seasonings, and serve.
